about.title: R&D Biotech Focused on Outcomes
about.p1: Golden Cell advances membrane‑free stem cell technologies, immunotherapy, and gene therapy supported by cryobiology‑based processing.
about.p2: We leverage umbilical cord adult stem cells—close to embryonic characteristics—prioritizing efficacy and safety.

t1.title: Membrane‑Free Stem Cells
t1.body: Active proteins are efficiently delivered and act immediately without cell membranes.

t2.title: Peripheral Signals
t2.body: Harnessing peripheral secretion signals to coordinate systemic repair.

t3.title: Oncolytic Vectors
t3.body: Replicating, immunogenic viruses insert genes targeting abnormal cancer loci.

t4.title: Cryo Lyophilization
t4.body: Cryobiology‑based freeze‑drying improves stability and logistics.

t5.title: Cell Injection
t5.body: Targeted delivery platforms increase bioavailability and safety.

therapies.title: Therapeutic Areas
therapies.a3b: Immunotherapies and gene delivery for cancer.

products.title: Products
products.disclaimer: For professional and research use where applicable; claims subject to clinical validation.
products.safetyBody: Steroid test results available upon request; manufactured under documented quality controls.

m1.b: Completed preclinical experiments extracting cells from ascites and halting proliferation; data package ready.

m2.b: Cryobiology‑based freeze‑drying reduces initial investment and simplifies distribution.

m3.b: Product release planning underway; listing strategy aligned with growth targets.

research.title: Research & Development
research.s1: Active peptides in our stem cells

investors.title: For Investors
investors.body: Strategic position in biopharma with validated preclinical data, scalable processes, and a focused launch plan.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.body: Interested in partnerships, clinical collaboration, or investment? Reach out and our team will respond promptly.
contact.privacy: We respect privacy and handle data responsibly.

careers.title: Careers
careers.tagline: We’re building a world‑class biotech team.
